name: OpenSourceMafia
tagline: Open source Java client and Android app for the classic group murder mystery game
body:
**An open source Java-based platform for the Mafia murder mystery party game by @stephenhu3**.
**Currently available on desktop and Android 4.0+.**

• Each player is randomly assigned a role and an alignment towards the Mafia or the Town.

• Every night, each player performs his/her role's ability and votes towards eliminating a suspicious player.

• This is a game of deceit, persuasion, teamwork, and careful planning.

• The goal of each player depends on the winning condition of the respective roles.

• Game rules and roles are based on the SC2 Mafia Wiki: 
http://wiki.sc2mafia.com/index.php?title=Main_Page
